Type help [command] to find out more

Available commands:

help.cd: cd [directory]      display different information about me

cd.about: Hi, I'm Benjamin Choon I'm a junior full-stack developer currently working in a full-stack role where I'm focused on strengthening my backend skills and mastering modern frameworks. I'm passionate about building efficient, scalable web applications and continuously learning new technologies to improve my productivity and value as a developer. To contact me, please run: cd contact Or click here to learn more: Open About Me
cd.contact: Email: benjaminchoon03@gmail.com To find me on linkedin or github, run: cd linkedin or cd github
